 2022-12162022-11-17,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of KATHLEEN THOMPSON of Ottawa, Ontario, to a position within the Royal Canadian Mounted Police with a rank equivalent to associate deputy head, to be styled Chief Administrative Officer of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, to hold office during pleasure, effective November 28, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
